item.title: Building Production-Ready Agentic Systems with LangGraph and Oracle Cloud
item.description: A practitioner's guide to architecting and deploying multi-agent AI systems that scale. Real patterns from production deployments at Oracle, with code examples and architectural blueprints.

item.title: The Complete Guide to Model Context Protocol (MCP) Server Development
item.description: From zero to production MCP server in one guide. Build custom context providers that give AI agents superpowers, with real TypeScript implementations and enterprise patterns.

item.title: From Prototype to Production: Enterprise AI Governance at Scale
item.description: The hard-won lessons from deploying regulated AI systems at Oracle. Real governance frameworks, compliance patterns, and the human processes that make enterprise AI actually work.

item.title: The Creative OS: A Guide to Building Your Creative Operating System
item.description: Learn how to design and build your own Creative Operating System (Creative OS) to enhance your creativity, productivity, and impact.

item.title: Golden Age of Intelligence: Reader-First Growth Playbook
item.description: A practical, reader-focused plan to translate the Golden Age of Intelligence into content, SEO, and distribution moves that meet your audience where they are right now.

item.title: The Agentic Creator OS: How to Orchestrate AI Like a Studio
item.description: Move beyond tool chaos and build the Agentic Creator OS that powers every FrankX.ai drop. This field guide shows you how to orchestrate multi-agent workflows, score your work with music, and ship premium experiences on repeat.

item.title: The Intelligence Revolution Playbook: Building Conscious AI Systems in 2025
item.description: A systems-first guide to orchestrating conscious AI across products, teams, and experiences. Transform from random AI tool usage to systematic intelligence architecture.

item.title: The Intelligence Revolution Playbook: Navigating the $10T Shift
item.description: A practical blueprint for Oracle technologists, founders, and creators to capture value as intelligence, automation, and conscious design converge.

item.title: Conscious AI Integration OS: 7 Layers To Align Teams, Agents, and Trust
item.description: A practical operating system for leaders who want conscious AI integration—grounded in governance, creativity, and measurable value—across 2025 initiatives.

item.title: Agentic AI Roadmap 2025: From Studio Rituals to Enterprise Governance
item.description: A strategic blueprint for creators, founders, and executives to deploy agentic AI systems in 2025, aligned with the FrankX Intelligence Atlas roadmap.

item.title: FrankX Intelligence Atlas Vol. I: Architecting the Agentic Era
item.description: A 10,000-word flagship report on the 2025 intelligence landscape, from frontier labs to open-source ecosystems, adoption metrics, and builder-ready frameworks.

item.title: Agentic SEO Publishing Masterplan: 12-Day Accelerator from September 19
item.description: Build a 15,000-word intelligence system that fuses Google’s latest search dynamics with agentic AI production pipelines. This masterplan orchestrates the next twelve days of publishing, from flagship essays to automated supporting posts, distribution rituals, and crawl amplification."

item.title: The Golden Age of Intelligence: An Agentic SEO Operating System for Exponential Reach
item.description: Design a 12-day sprint that ushers FrankX.ai into the Golden Age of Intelligence with a 15,000-word masterplan covering flagship content, high-frequency publishing, automation pipelines, distribution loops, and measurement rituals."

item.title: AI Doesn't Have To Be Soulless (And Here's How I Know)
item.description: After 15 years architecting enterprise AI systems, I've discovered something profound: technology can amplify human creativity rather than replace it. Here's my story and what I've learned.

item.title: The Soul Frequency Framework: How to Find Your Authentic Creative Voice in the AI Age
item.description: Everyone has a unique creative frequency — a way of expressing that's authentically yours. Here's how to discover yours and use AI to amplify it, not mask it.

item.title: The Family & Professional's Guide to Thriving with AI (Not Just Surviving It)
item.description: A practical, honest guide for families and working professionals who want to understand AI's real impact and how to navigate it successfully — without the hype or fear.

item.title: The Conscious Entrepreneur's Guide to Building AI-Powered Businesses That Actually Serve Humanity
item.description: How to build AI-powered businesses that create genuine value, foster human connection, and generate sustainable profits — without losing your soul or your ethics.

item.title: 500 Songs Later: What AI Music Creation Taught Me About Consciousness, Creativity, and the Future
item.description: After creating 500+ songs with AI, I've discovered something profound: music isn't just entertainment—it's consciousness technology. Here's what I learned from my journey into AI-human musical collaboration.
